mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_attachment( attachment_title, attachment_content, attachment_writer, board_no) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardNo}) ;
mapper.select:
SELECT ba.board_no, ba.attachment_title, ba.attachment_writer, bb.board_reg_date, bb.board_mod_date, bb.board_view, bb.category_board
FROM board_attachment ba LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bb.board_no = ba.board_no
ORDER BY ba.board_no DESC
LIMIT 0, 10 ;
